title: Why does Ariana Grande want to be black? - Quora

response.answer_text: What made you to come up with this false allegation. You seem ignorant. Anyway just cause Ariana Grande admires and respect Black ppl doesn’t mean she wants to be Black. She’s influenced by Black people doesn’t mean is trying to act Black. If you knew about the history of music and Black History in general you will realize the music genre she sings was created by Black ppl. Unlike other white people Ariana Grande knows her history. and I’m Black myself.

You seem like a trend follower, or just sees what everyone else sees. She’s italian and most of the photos you’ve probably seen (like the ones where she’s wearing the white pants and burgundy lipstick) where she looks very dark. These are cleary edited. Plus when she was in Victorious she wore 3x lighter shaded foundation to look lighter (here’s proof from a 2011 tweet)  and here’s a picture compared to her mother and nonna  and some more :)
